revisionDesc.change: corrected orgName, added choice tags, pbs
proofread and edited; shortened Wilson annotation, since it seemed out of place for this letter

body.p: I take the present opporutnityopportunity to write you these few lines to inform you that iI am well and in good health at Present time and iI truly hope when these few lines reach you that they may find you enjoying good health. iI answered your last letter and not having recivdrecieved any answer iI think it very Strange iI recivdrecieved these two pictures and give one to wilsonWilson, and kept one my self and iI was very glad to reciverecieve them for iI would rather see your face than your picture at all wilsonWilson wrote the same time that iI did and not having Recivedreceived any answer and wilsonWilson says he can not think What the reason is that he does not get and answer from you. Me and wilsonWilson expectyexpects to come through there this fall and we will come and see you if ever you have the opportunity of calling around richmondRichmond please to call around Camp Grant and see us. please excuse this Short Letter Write soon good by I remain your Freindfriend
